name: Kiritsu aru ki no otoko
description: No otoko's kind was one of the first people of Japan. The goddes of the sun Amaterasu  created this species to teach Japanese discipline, devotion to work, and the term "ikigai" to other human species. In time addicted to alcohol,  money and drugs that other people have given him, so Adam forgot his duty and was punished by being transformed into an ordinary human being. In order to take revenge on the gods who forgot him and the people who deceived him, he started to do evil to both other holy beings and people.
